title: PetSafe ScoopFree Crystal Pro Self Cleaning Litter Box, Automatic Cat Litter Box, Includes Disposable Crystal Litter Tray (Grey, Uncovered)
description: Imagine a self cleaning automatic cat litter box, turning your dream of a world where your cat's litter box is always clean into reality. This automatic litter box self cleaning system takes care of the dirty work for weeks at a time, freeing up your valuable time. Experience the unbeatable odor control that this cat litter box automatic cleaning offers. The ScoopFree Crystal litter tray, included in the package, is a crucial feature of this litter box automatic system, effectively neutralizing any unpleasant odors. The disposable tray that comes with this cat litter box self cleaning system are lined with plastic to prevent any leakage, ensuring your floors remain clean and stain-free. Find cleanup to be a breeze with this no scoop litterbox. Each tray comes with a lid for quick and easy disposal, making this one of the most convenient litter boxes on the market. The health counter and motion sensors included in the PetSafe ScoopFree Crystal Pro Self-Cleaning Litterbox coupled with the U.S.-based customer care from PetSafe, make this litter box a smart choice for proactive cat care.
